export let TaskPriority=/*#__PURE__*/function(TaskPriority){TaskPriority["LOW"]="low";TaskPriority["MEDIUM"]="medium";TaskPriority["HIGH"]="high";return TaskPriority;}({});export let TaskStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(TaskStatus){TaskStatus["PENDING"]="pending";TaskStatus["COMPLETED"]="completed";TaskStatus["OVERDUE"]="overdue";TaskStatus["DUE_SOON"]="due-soon";return TaskStatus;}({});// Type guards
export const isTask=obj=>{return obj&&typeof obj.id==='string'&&typeof obj.title==='string'&&typeof obj.completed==='boolean'&&typeof obj.priority==='string'&&typeof obj.userId==='string'&&obj.createdAt instanceof Date&&obj.updatedAt instanceof Date;};export const isTaskFilters=obj=>{return obj&&(obj.page===undefined||typeof obj.page==='number')&&(obj.limit===undefined||typeof obj.limit==='number')&&(obj.completed===undefined||typeof obj.completed==='boolean')&&(obj.category===undefined||typeof obj.category==='string')&&(obj.priority===undefined||Object.values(TaskPriority).includes(obj.priority))&&(obj.search===undefined||typeof obj.search==='string');};
